subject: Pro plus
description_text:
Hello, when would you add options to recognize the position of the brake
pedal in kilograms not just random numbers, pro plus ofc

conversations.body_text: Hi SpiXiQ, The kg display is not just a software change — the main controller has also been hardware-adapted, and the amplification factor affects the result. You may consider purchasing the PlusX controller, which supports this feature and also provides vibration feedback.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
